Package demolition

Class Map

java.lang.Object
demolition.Map
public class Map extends Object
The Map class. Contains information about a game map such as its tiles and time limit.

      The player object. The player is static so it can be accessed by any class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map​(processing.core.PApplet parent, String[] mapStrings, int time)
      Constructor. Sets the local mapStrings and time variables to the arguments. The enemies are added to the enemies array list.

  • Method Details

    • loadMaps

      public static void loadMaps​(processing.core.PApplet parent, String cURL)
      Loads each map from the config file.

    • reloadMap

      public static void reloadMap​(processing.core.PApplet parent, String configURL)
      Reloads the currentMap. This method only reloads the current map and not all of the maps. The mapStrings are reloaded back to how they were at the start. The enemies are reloaded.

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet parent)
      Draws each tile of the current map.
